CreateCashExpenses: Create table IF NOT EXISTS CashExpenses(ItemName Varchar(225),Quantity Int,Amount Decimal,ShopOwnerPhnNumber Varchar(225),SpentBy Varchar(225),TransactionMode Varchar(225),Receipt Varchar(225))
CreateItemUsage: Create table IF NOT EXISTS ItemUsage(ItemName Varchar(225),Quantity Int,Purpose Varchar(225),SpentBy Varchar(225))
